7// BufferGL.cpp: Implements the class methods for BufferGL.
8
9#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/BufferGL.h"
10
11#include "common/debug.h"
12#include "common/utilities.h"
13#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
14#include "libANGLE/angletypes.h"
15#include "libANGLE/formatutils.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/ContextGL.h"
17#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/FunctionsGL.h"
18#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/StateManagerGL.h"
19#include "libANGLE/renderer/gl/renderergl_utils.h"
20
21namespace rx
22{
23
24// Use the GL_COPY_READ_BUFFER binding when two buffers need to be bound simultaneously.
25// GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER is supported on more versions but can modify the state of the currently
26// bound VAO. Two simultaneous buffer bindings are only needed for glCopyBufferSubData which also
27// adds the GL_COPY_READ_BUFFER binding.
28static constexpr gl::BufferBinding SourceBufferOperationTarget = gl::BufferBinding::CopyRead;
29
30// Use the GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER binding for most operations since it's available on all
31// supported GL versions and doesn't affect any current state when it changes.
32static constexpr gl::BufferBinding DestBufferOperationTarget = gl::BufferBinding::Array;
33
34BufferGL::BufferGL(const gl::BufferState &state, GLuint buffer)
35 : BufferImpl(state),
36 mIsMapped(false),
37 mMapOffset(0),
38 mMapSize(0),
39 mShadowCopy(),
40 mBufferSize(0),
41 mBufferID(buffer)
42{}
43
44BufferGL::~BufferGL()
45{
46 ASSERT(mBufferID == 0);
47}
48
49void BufferGL::destroy(const gl::Context *context)
50{
51 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
52 stateManager->deleteBuffer(mBufferID);
53 mBufferID = 0;
54}
55
56angle::Result BufferGL::setData(const gl::Context *context,
57 gl::BufferBinding target,
58 const void *data,
59 size_t size,
60 gl::BufferUsage usage)
61{
62 ContextGL *contextGL = GetImplAs<ContextGL>(context);
63 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
64 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
65 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = GetFeaturesGL(context);
66
67 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
68 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->bufferData(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget), size, data,
69 ToGLenum(usage)));
70
71 if (features.keepBufferShadowCopy.enabled)
72 {
73 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_ALLOC(contextGL, mShadowCopy.resize(size));
74
75 if (size > 0 && data != nullptr)
76 {
77 memcpy(mShadowCopy.data(), data, size);
78 }
79 }
80
81 mBufferSize = size;
82
83 return angle::Result::Continue;
84}
85
86angle::Result BufferGL::setSubData(const gl::Context *context,
87 gl::BufferBinding target,
88 const void *data,
89 size_t size,
90 size_t offset)
91{
92 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
93 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
94 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = GetFeaturesGL(context);
95
96 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
97 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->bufferSubData(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget), offset,
98 size, data));
99
100 if (features.keepBufferShadowCopy.enabled && size > 0)
101 {
102 memcpy(mShadowCopy.data() + offset, data, size);
103 }
104
105 return angle::Result::Continue;
106}
107
108angle::Result BufferGL::copySubData(const gl::Context *context,
109 BufferImpl *source,
110 GLintptr sourceOffset,
111 GLintptr destOffset,
112 GLsizeiptr size)
113{
114 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
115 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
116 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = GetFeaturesGL(context);
117
118 BufferGL *sourceGL = GetAs<BufferGL>(source);
119
120 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
121 stateManager->bindBuffer(SourceBufferOperationTarget, sourceGL->getBufferID());
122
123 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->copyBufferSubData(gl::ToGLenum(SourceBufferOperationTarget),
124 gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget),
125 sourceOffset, destOffset, size));
126
127 if (features.keepBufferShadowCopy.enabled && size > 0)
128 {
129 ASSERT(sourceGL->mShadowCopy.size() >= static_cast<size_t>(sourceOffset + size));
130 memcpy(mShadowCopy.data() + destOffset, sourceGL->mShadowCopy.data() + sourceOffset, size);
131 }
132
133 return angle::Result::Continue;
134}
135
136angle::Result BufferGL::map(const gl::Context *context, GLenum access, void **mapPtr)
137{
138 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
139 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
140 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = GetFeaturesGL(context);
141
142 if (features.keepBufferShadowCopy.enabled)
143 {
144 *mapPtr = mShadowCopy.data();
145 }
146 else if (functions->mapBuffer)
147 {
148 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
149 *mapPtr = ANGLE_GL_TRY(
150 context, functions->mapBuffer(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget), access));
151 }
152 else
153 {
154 ASSERT(functions->mapBufferRange && access == GL_WRITE_ONLY_OES);
155 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
156 *mapPtr =
157 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->mapBufferRange(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget),
158 0, mBufferSize, GL_MAP_WRITE_BIT));
159 }
160
161 mIsMapped = true;
162 mMapOffset = 0;
163 mMapSize = mBufferSize;
164
165 return angle::Result::Continue;
166}
167
168angle::Result BufferGL::mapRange(const gl::Context *context,
169 size_t offset,
170 size_t length,
171 GLbitfield access,
172 void **mapPtr)
173{
174 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
175 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
176 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = GetFeaturesGL(context);
177
178 if (features.keepBufferShadowCopy.enabled)
179 {
180 *mapPtr = mShadowCopy.data() + offset;
181 }
182 else
183 {
184 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
185 *mapPtr =
186 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->mapBufferRange(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget),
187 offset, length, access));
188 }
189
190 mIsMapped = true;
191 mMapOffset = offset;
192 mMapSize = length;
193
194 return angle::Result::Continue;
195}
196
197angle::Result BufferGL::unmap(const gl::Context *context, GLboolean *result)
198{
199 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
200 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
201 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = GetFeaturesGL(context);
202
203 ASSERT(result);
204 ASSERT(mIsMapped);
205
206 if (features.keepBufferShadowCopy.enabled)
207 {
208 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
209 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context,
210 functions->bufferSubData(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget), mMapOffset,
211 mMapSize, mShadowCopy.data() + mMapOffset));
212 *result = GL_TRUE;
213 }
214 else
215 {
216 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
217 *result =
218 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->unmapBuffer(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget)));
219 }
220
221 mIsMapped = false;
222 return angle::Result::Continue;
223}
224
225angle::Result BufferGL::getIndexRange(const gl::Context *context,
226 gl::DrawElementsType type,
227 size_t offset,
228 size_t count,
229 bool primitiveRestartEnabled,
230 gl::IndexRange *outRange)
231{
232 const FunctionsGL *functions = GetFunctionsGL(context);
233 StateManagerGL *stateManager = GetStateManagerGL(context);
234 const angle::FeaturesGL &features = GetFeaturesGL(context);
235
236 ASSERT(!mIsMapped);
237
238 if (features.keepBufferShadowCopy.enabled)
239 {
240 *outRange = gl::ComputeIndexRange(type, mShadowCopy.data() + offset, count,
241 primitiveRestartEnabled);
242 }
243 else
244 {
245 stateManager->bindBuffer(DestBufferOperationTarget, mBufferID);
246
247 const GLuint typeBytes = gl::GetDrawElementsTypeSize(type);
248 const uint8_t *bufferData =
249 MapBufferRangeWithFallback(functions, gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget), offset,
250 count * typeBytes, GL_MAP_READ_BIT);
251 if (bufferData)
252 {
253 *outRange = gl::ComputeIndexRange(type, bufferData, count, primitiveRestartEnabled);
254 ANGLE_GL_TRY(context, functions->unmapBuffer(gl::ToGLenum(DestBufferOperationTarget)));
255 }
256 else
257 {
258 // Workaround the null driver not having map support.
259 *outRange = gl::IndexRange(0, 0, 1);
260 }
261 }
262
263 return angle::Result::Continue;
264}
265
266GLuint BufferGL::getBufferID() const
267{
268 return mBufferID;
269}
270} // namespace rx
